ClientSideHelpers - package ClientSideHelpers
 
ClientSignal - Class in ClientSideHelpers
The Object Array must have these specific variables and when sending them to this class order must be maintained: A Key (int) which is the grabbed from Database Statements to tell it what action to perform Authentication LinkedList with your username, token, and permissions (this order) Data LinkedList of what to add to the statement (check the DatabaseNavigator.Response.getValue() for the order and params)
